mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, s.*,t.* FROM BM_STORE s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT r.store_id, round(r.score, 1) score, r.review_count, r.boss_comment_count FROM ( SELECT store_id, AVG(score) SCORE, count(review_content) review_count, count(boss_comment) boss_comment_count FROM bm_review GROUP BY store_id ) r ) t ON s.id = t.store_id WHERE CATEGORY = #{category} AND STORE_ADDRESS1 LIKE '${address1}%' ) WHERE rn BETWEEN ${startPage } AND ${endPage }

SELECT * FROM BM_STORE, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROUND(AVG(score),1) SCORE, count(review_content) review_count, count(boss_comment) boss_comment_count FROM bm_review WHERE store_id = #{id } ), ( SELECT COUNT(*) LIKES_COUNT FROM BM_LIKES WHERE STORE_ID = #{id } ), ( SELECT SUM(order_count) order_count from ( SELECT count(*) order_count FROM bm_order_detail_user WHERE store_id = #{id } UNION ALL SELECT count(*) order_count FROM bm_order_detail_non_user WHERE store_id = #{id } ) ) ) WHERE ID = #{id }
SELECT id, store_id, food_name, food_price, food_dec, food_img, food_thumb FROM bm_food WHERE STORE_ID = #{id }
SELECT id, food_id, option_name, option_price FROM bm_food_option WHERE food_id = #{foodId }

SELECT r.order_num, r.store_id, r.review_content, r.boss_comment, r.regi_date, r.score, r.review_img, r.user_id, u.nickname FROM bm_review r LEFT JOIN bm_user u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.store_id = #{id} ORDER BY regi_date DESC
SELECT STORE_ID FROM BM_LIKES WHERE USER_ID = #{userId } AND STORE_ID = #{storeId }

SELECT s.id ,s.category ,s.store_name ,s.store_address1 ,s.store_address2 ,s.store_address3 ,s.store_phone ,s.store_img ,s.store_thumb ,s.opening_time ,s.closing_time ,s.delevery_tip ,s.store_des ,t.score ,t.review_count ,t.boss_comment_count ,l.user_id ,l.likes_date FROM BM_STORE s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT r.store_id, r.score, r.review_count, r.boss_comment_count FROM ( SELECT store_id, AVG(score) SCORE, count(review_content) review_count, count(boss_comment) boss_comment_count FROM bm_review GROUP BY store_id ) r ) t ON s.id = t.store_id RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT USER_ID,STORE_ID,LIKES_DATE FROM BM_LIKES WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ) l ON s.id = l.store_id ORDER BY LIKES_DATE DESC
